mapper.select: SELECT SRSEQ FROM (SELECT SRSEQ FROM SEMESTER ORDER BY SRSEQ DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=1
SELECT MAJORSEQ ,NAME FROM MAJOR WHERE CATEGORIES=#{categories} ORDER BY MAJORSEQ

SELECT LE.TYPENUM AS TYPENUM ,Y.TYPENAME AS TYPENAME ,LE.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM ,LE.NAME AS NAME ,LE.DIVIDE AS DIVIDE ,LE.CREDIT AS CREDIT ,P.NAME AS PNAME ,LE.OCCUPANCY AS OCCUPANCY ,(SELECT COUNT(SUSEQ) FROM SIGNUP S WHERE S.LECTURENUM = LE.LECTURENUM) AS COUNT ,LE.IS_REAL_TIME AS REAL ,LE.GRADE AS GRADE ,LE.FILENAME AS FILENAME FROM LECTURE LE, PROFESSOR P, MAJOR_PROFESSOR M, LECTURETYPE Y WHERE LE.SRSEQ = #{srSeq} AND LE.TYPENUM = #{typeNum} AND LE.MPSEQ = M.MPSEQ AND M.PREGINUM = P.PREGINUM AND LE.TYPENUM = Y.TYPENUM

SELECT LE.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM ,T.DAY || ' ' || T.STARTTIME || '~' || T.ENDTIME AS STIME FROM LECTURETIME T ,LECTURE LE ,PROFESSOR P ,MAJOR_PROFESSOR M , LECTURETYPE Y
WHERE LE.SRSEQ = #{srSeq} AND T.lecturenum = LE.LECTURENUM AND LE.TYPENUM =#{typeNum} AND LE.MPSEQ = M.MPSEQ AND M.PREGINUM = P.PREGINUM AND LE.TYPENUM = Y.TYPENUM

SELECT L.TYPENUM AS TYPENUM ,Y.TYPENAME AS TYPENAME ,L.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM ,L.NAME AS NAME ,L.DIVIDE AS DIVIDE ,L.CREDIT AS CREDIT ,P.NAME AS PNAME ,L.OCCUPANCY AS OCCUPANCY ,(SELECT COUNT(SUSEQ) FROM SIGNUP S WHERE S.LECTURENUM = L.LECTURENUM) AS COUNT ,L.IS_REAL_TIME AS REAL ,L.GRADE AS GRADE ,L.FILENAME AS FILENAME FROM LECTURE L, PROFESSOR P, MAJOR_PROFESSOR M, LECTURETYPE Y WHERE L.SRSEQ = #{srSeq} AND M.MAJORSEQ=#{majorSeq} AND L.TYPENUM = 1 AND L.MPSEQ = M.MPSEQ AND M.PREGINUM = P.PREGINUM AND L.TYPENUM = Y.TYPENUM

SELECT T.DAY || ' ' || T.STARTTIME || '~' || T.ENDTIME AS STIME ,T.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM FROM LECTURETIME T ,LECTURE L ,PROFESSOR P ,MAJOR_PROFESSOR M ,LECTURETYPE Y WHERE L.SRSEQ = #{srSeq} AND L.TYPENUM = 1 AND T.lecturenum = L.LECTURENUM AND M.MAJORSEQ=#{majorSeq} AND L.MPSEQ = M.MPSEQ AND M.PREGINUM = P.PREGINUM AND L.TYPENUM = Y.TYPENUM

SELECT L.TYPENUM AS TYPENUM ,Y.TYPENAME AS TYPENAME ,L.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM ,L.NAME AS NAME ,L.DIVIDE AS DIVIDE ,L.CREDIT AS CREDIT ,P.NAME AS PNAME ,L.OCCUPANCY AS OCCUPANCY ,(SELECT COUNT(SUSEQ) FROM SIGNUP S WHERE S.LECTURENUM = L.LECTURENUM) AS COUNT ,L.IS_REAL_TIME AS REAL ,(SELECT SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(A,', ' || STIME) ORDER BY STIME).EXTRACT('//text()'), 2) STIME FROM ( SELECT T.DAY || ' ' || T.STARTTIME || '~' || T.ENDTIME AS STIME ,T.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM FROM LECTURETIME T WHERE L.SRSEQ = #{srSeq} AND T.lecturenum = L.LECTURENUM ) GROUP BY LECTURENUM) AS STIME ,L.GRADE AS GRADE ,L.FILENAME AS FILENAME FROM LECTURE L, PROFESSOR P, MAJOR_PROFESSOR M, LECTURETYPE Y WHERE ${option} LIKE '%' ||#{search}|| '%' AND L.SRSEQ = #{srSeq} AND L.MPSEQ = M.MPSEQ AND M.PREGINUM = P.PREGINUM AND L.TYPENUM = Y.TYPENUM

SELECT TO_CHAR(L.OCCUPANCY) AS OCCUPANCY ,L.IS_REAL_TIME AS REAL ,(SELECT COUNT(SUSEQ) FROM SIGNUP S WHERE S.LECTURENUM = #{lectureNum}) AS COUNT ,L.SRSEQ AS SRSEQ ,L.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM FROM LECTURE L WHERE L.LECTURENUM = #{lectureNum} FOR UPDATE WAIT 10
SELECT SUSEQ FROM SIGNUP WHERE LECTURENUM=#{lectureNum} AND SREGINUM=#{sregiNum}

INSERT INTO SIGNUP ( SUSEQ ,SREGINUM ,LECTURENUM ,SRSEQ ,INDATE ,TIMESTAMP ) VALUES ( SUSEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{sregiNum} ,#{LECTURENUM} ,TO_NUMBER(#{SRSEQ}) ,SYSDATE ,SYSTIMESTAMP )
SELECT SUSEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT S.SUSEQ AS SUSEQ ,S.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM ,LT.LTSEQ AS LTSEQ ,LT.STARTTIME AS STARTTIME ,LT.ENDTIME AS ENDTIME ,TO_CHAR(LT.DAY) AS DAY FROM SIGNUP S, LECTURETIME LT WHERE S.SREGINUM=#{sregiNum} AND S.SRSEQ = #{srSeq} AND S.LECTURENUM = LT.LECTURENUM

SELECT S.SUSEQ AS SUSEQ ,S.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM ,L.NAME AS NAME ,LT.LTSEQ AS LTSEQ ,LT.STARTTIME AS STARTTIME ,LT.ENDTIME AS ENDTIME ,TO_CHAR(LT.DAY) AS DAY FROM SIGNUP S, LECTURETIME LT ,LECTURE L WHERE S.LECTURENUM = LT.LECTURENUM AND L.LECTURENUM = LT.LECTURENUM AND S.SREGINUM=#{sregiNum}
SELECT LTSEQ ,LECTURENUM ,STARTTIME ,ENDTIME ,DAY FROM LECTURETIME WHERE LECTURENUM=#{lectureNum}

SELECT S.LECTURENUM AS LECTURENUM ,L.NAME AS NAME ,L.DIVIDE AS DIVIDE ,LT.STARTTIME AS STARTTIME ,LT.ENDTIME AS ENDTIME ,LT.DAY AS DAY FROM SIGNUP S ,LECTURE L ,LECTURETIME LT WHERE S.SREGINUM=#{sregiNum} AND S.SRSEQ=#{srSeq} AND S.LECTURENUM = L.LECTURENUM AND S.LECTURENUM = LT.LECTURENUM
SELECT L.CREDIT AS CREDIT FROM LECTURE L, SIGNUP S WHERE L.LECTURENUM=S.LECTURENUM AND S.SREGINUM=#{sregiNum} AND S.SRSEQ=#{srSeq}
